description:
**Tool Overview**:

This tool provides direct download links for the Visual C++ Redistributable packages. These packages are required to run applications developed using Visual Studio. 

**Details**:

The following download links are available:
1. **Visual C++ 2019 Redistributable (x64)**: [Download Link](https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe)
2. **Visual C++ 2019 Redistributable (x86)**: [Download Link](https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x86.exe)
3. **Visual C++ 2019 Redistributable (ARM64)**: [Download Link](https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.arm64.exe)
4. **Visual C++ 2017 Redistributable (x64)**: [Download Link](https://aka.ms/vs/15/release/vc_redist.x64.exe)

These redistributables must be installed on end-user machines to support applications that depend on them. It's important to ensure that users are updated with the latest versions to maintain compatibility and security.
